typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Row ID} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		Discount as string,
		{Unit Price} as string,
		{Shipping Cost} as string,
		{Customer ID} as string,
		{Customer Name} as string,
		{Ship Mode} as string,
		{Customer Segment} as string,
		{Product Category} as string,
		{Product Sub-Category} as string,
		{Product Container} as string,
		{Product Name} as string,
		{Product Base Margin} as string,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		{State or Province} as string,
		City as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Order Date} as string,
		{Ship Date} as string,
		Profit as string,
		{Quantity ordered new} as string,
		Sales as string,
		{Order ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
ModifyColumns2 aggregate(groupBy({Product Category},
		{Product Sub-Category}),
	Sales = sum(Sales),
		Profit = sum(Profit)) ~> Aggregate1
source1 derive(Discount = toFloat(Discount),
		{Row ID} = toInteger({Row ID}),
		Profit = toDouble(Profit),
		Sales = toDouble(Sales)) ~> ModifyColumns2
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Row ID	Order Priority	Discount	Unit Price	Shipping Cost	Customer ID	Customer Name	Ship Mode	Customer Segment	Product Category	Product Sub-Category	Product Container	Product Name	Product Base Margin	Country	Region	State or Province	City	Postal Code	Order Date	Ship Date	Profit	Quantity ordered new	Sales	Order ID} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DFAggregation.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
